Reviews.Title: “Minimal (not in a Euro design way), great location, this is bargin basement”

Reviews.Content: stayed june 2010 5 changed locations city booked looking paces paid double anyhow bathroom kitchenette clean carpet looked clean vacuumed beds spent life summer camp window air conditioners noisy super inexpensive decently safe town city queen street fridge fine internet recommend willing dorm experience

Reviews.Title: “Lower prices is its main positive but rooms, sheets, and the surrounding area are quite dirty”
Reviews.Author: pmsocc17
Reviews.Content: prices charges low compared downtown toronto clean bathrooms nice location augusta ave grange ave minutes walk queen st south chinatown east easy downtown hotel apartment building owner manager rents units travelers stay looks housing project hotel provide free internet wifi ethernet cable surcharge pay using amex visa mc avoid parking 350 bucks night weekend rates tend weekday rates
